description.en: Resets your STR stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.ar: Resets your STR stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.br: Reembolsa TODOS os pontos que foram anteriormente adicionados em FOR para que possam ser utilizados novamente. Aplica-se apenas à sua página de atributos atual.
description.cns: 力量属性点初始化，仅对当前属性页有效。
description.de: Setzt die STR Werte zurück. Gilt nur für die aktuelle Stat Seite.
description.fi: Resets your STR stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.fil: Resets your STR stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.fr: Parchemin permettant de redistribuer une fois les points mis dans la statistique de force (FOR) sur la page actuelle.
description.id: Mereset statistik STR anda. Hanya berlaku untuk halaman stat anda saat ini.
description.it: Resets your STR stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.jp: 力を初期化します。現在のステータスページにのみ適用
description.kr: Resets your STR stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.nl: Resets your STR stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.pl: Resets your STR stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.ru: Resets your STR stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.sp: Resetea tus estadísticas de STR. Solo se aplica a sus estadísticas actuales.
description.sw: Resets your STR stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.th: รีเซ็ต STR ของคุณ มีผลกับหน้า Stat ปัจจุบันเท่านั้น
description.tw: 重置您的力量數值。 僅適用於您當前的統計頁面。
description.vi: Đặt lại STR stats. Chỉ áp dụng cho trang stat hiện tại của bạn.
